extendedInfo.description: Pocket Book Writer LiteBookWriterLite is a simple, flexible, and cost-effective application to write books/notes/draw diagrams etc on your Android Phone/Tablet.You can write a book, diary, novel, story and export it as a PDF.Many people, at least once in their life, have thought about writing a book.The goal isn't always to spread an idea. Sometimes the goal is to make something that gives your ideas substance and allows them to travel.Users of free versions can use only 4 pages. Please support our work by buying paid version.Features- Write and Organize Books/Notes/Stories for Android Phones/Tablets.- Complete data is stored locally on the device. - Handwritten notes can be saved inside paint book.- Book PDF can be generated and viewed with any PDF reader.Please Note: You need to install a PDF reader to view PDF on the Phone.- Pages can be bookmarked and the Table of Content is generated automatically.- Images and Notes can be embedded inside the page.- Book can be protected by password.- Book Cover can be customized by the user.- User can share books with friends via Email.- PDF can be saved on External Storage.Known Issue.- Resizing of image might fail on some phones.We are in processing of fixing it and will release an update soon.If you have any compatibility issue on your phone/tablet please contact us at support@easybookwriter.com.Please visit http://www.easybookwriter.com for more information.Keywords: write a book bookwriter write notes paint handwritten notes

reviews.title: Lame!
reviews.comment: I can\'t get the pro version for starters, I wrote a good start of a book then I only got four pages! Add more pages! New color text!
reviews.author: Abby Star

reviews.title: Fell out of love
reviews.comment: I use to be in love with this app. All it does now is force close after opening. I am no longer able to write or view what I have already wrote. My five stars are now one star. If fixed will be happy to change.my review.
reviews.author: Kim Lee

reviews.title: Book
reviews.comment: I love it! I really wanted to write my own book :D.
reviews.author: Abigail Meep

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work after first use
reviews.comment: I used it once but I can\'t use it anymore. It simply goes to a black screen.
reviews.author: Ronry Love

reviews.title: Very handy
reviews.comment: Easy book writer is an excellent app. Easy to use and very handy. I especially liked the user interface. All features work perfectly fine. I am not a writer but it sure made me write something :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Natasha heffernan
reviews.comment: I love it! It helps me write all my novels and to keep them orginised!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amateur app
reviews.comment: First off, what the hell, who\'s ever heard of a four page book? It does everything it says it does... you can write a full book by making like 30 four page books, but the app fails to emphasize you that only four pages are allowed in each and that you can\'t even export your book without going to pro... this app is extremely glitchy and laggy, so I\'m scared to go pro because I\'m scared that it\'ll be the same. This app is more for like a grocery shopping list. This app needs some major improvements
reviews.author: Eric Ebic

reviews.title: Good,but....
reviews.comment: Its good but it only allows you to write 4 pages wich really sucks
reviews.author: Julia Elainna

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: The other comments seem good so I decided to give it a try.  I have an Asus Transformer TF101 Tablet with a keyboard dock.  I downloaded this app. Then I ran it.  when the app launches it rotates the screen so its sideways.  All other app work well with correct screen rotation except this one.  The latter is true whether auto-rotate is on or off.  So since I can\'t write a book sideways....this ain\'t happening.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waste of space
reviews.comment: I downloaded this to copy and paste work from Google drive for was PC transfer. Just like the other apparently it only allow room for a thousand words. Silly to call it a book writer but doesn\'t have space to write a book.
reviews.author: Nicholas deMeo

reviews.title: Unfair
reviews.comment: It only let\'s you do a few pages. I prefer notebooks
reviews.author: Jessica Collins

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Was loving this app... Until i found out it only had four pages... Infinite pages 4 free, and I\'ll give a five star!!!
reviews.author: Phillip Aken

reviews.title: Fun but..
reviews.comment: Kinda long to donlowed and every time I flipped the page it crashed I tink you should donlowed but not so much worth it but it\'s fun on road trips:l
reviews.author: Cami Mclaughlin

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: You should definetly download this app it is awesome
